title: 我的世界出错打不开咋办
author: 54sei
txt_content:
一打开就这样 1.2.5 1.3.1 1.4.2 1.4.6都试了都打不开哪位大侠帮帮忙
   Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2012-12-30 12:57 编辑 

可能需要更新显卡驱动。。。（要么就是需要改垂直同步一类的东西，忘了）
